Media Coverage: Study Of Wi-Fi Data On CU’s Campus Could Help Students Avoid Areas Where COVID Risk May Be Greater

Sep 11, 2020

Our work (with the Dan Larremore) using WiFi access points to meausre building density on CU’s campus was covered by the local news.
